name: Escape of Happiness
description:
"Escape of Happiness" is a 2D sci-fi horror game, featuring you as a space explorer lost in the depths of a space station that, at first glance, seems abandoned. Traverse procedurally generated floors and avoid (or eliminate) horrific monsters while you try to find your way back to your ship.

After trying the game, you can offer your feedback here: https://forms.gle/r7VtUTVD6TDgRNub6
